description:
*MediaMonkey: The Media Organizer for Serious Collectors*

Manage small to large collections of audio files, videos and playlists (100,000+), whether on a hard drive, network, or CDs. Rip CDs, download podcasts, lookup artwork and other missing information online, tag almost any audio or video format, and automatically rename/re-organize files on your hard drive.
author: Ventis Media
